TopicTitle: Science meets art: Experience the planets website

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I found this website while searching for some nice space music and i thought i should share it with you.

It contains very nice HD paintings, showing scenes of our solar system and you will also have the opportunity to listen to some very excellent music tracks, fitting the mood of the images shown.

Very nice page. Enjoy

http://www.experiencetheplanets.com

Definetely! It would be nice if KSP had some planet specific themes and one for interplanetary travel or so.

I have just bought the album, presented on the website for 5$. With 35 minutes playtime, the album is not long, but its a wonderful piece of music.

Cool images. Sadly they are so small (only Full-HD) so i cant do anything usefull with them. I dont get why artists still do this, if its a real life paintig you could just scan it better while as a digital paintig resolution shouldnt matter at all...
